data: When John Stuart Webster, mining engineer and kicker-up-of-dust on distant trails, flagged the S. P., L. A. & S. L. Limited at a blistered board station in Death Valley, California, he had definitely resolved to do certain things.
S. P., L. A. & S. L. Limited | Death Valley | California

WHEN John Stuart Webster, mining engineer and kicker-up-of-dust on distant trails, flagged the S. P., L. A. & S. L. Limited at a blistered board station in Death Valley, California, he had definitely resolved to do certain things.
Kyne, Peter B. (Peter Bernard), 1880-1957; Cornwell, Dean, 1892-1960 [Illustrator]
